post.author: pieisgood
post.body:
So I got bored again and decided to work with Z-Brush on a face model. I am getting better damnit!

The lips are screwed up and don't have enough detail but I am working on that in my next model.

http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v166/ ... butest.jpg

post.author: modern
post.body: Nice work! Are you going to put this into Doom?

post.author: pieisgood
post.body: This was simply some Z-Brush fun. I could put it into doom, but the texture map and all that fun junk would have to be fairly large in order to get all the detail on the model into the game. I am sure I can whip up something reall quick for you to see what it would look like.
